name: Mark CHRISTESON, petitioner, v. George A. LOMBARDI, Director, Missouri Department of Corrections, et al.

court.name: Supreme Court of the United States

parties:
Mark CHRISTESON, petitioner,
v.
George A. LOMBARDI, Director, Missouri Department of Corrections, et al.

opinions.text:
Application for stay of execution of sentence of death presented to Justice ALITO and by him referred to the Court denied. Petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Eighth Circuit denied.
Justice SOTOMAYORwould grant the application for stay of execution.
opinions.author: Justice SOTOMAYORwould grant the application for stay of execution.

casebody.head_matter:
Mark CHRISTESON, petitioner,
v.
George A. LOMBARDI, Director, Missouri Department of Corrections, et al.
No. 14-6878 14A447.
Supreme Court of the United States
Oct. 28, 2014.
Opinion
